      • getTrainingData

        public java.util.List<TextData> getTrainingData()
                                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                org.apache.uima.UIMAException
        Read and processes the training data. All .txt files in the training_data folder are read, creating a corpus representation for each one, with the name of the file used as identifier.
        Returns:
        list of training corpora
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException

      • writeOutputFile

        public void writeOutputFile(java.lang.String filename,
                   java.lang.String data)
        Write the output to the specified file in the output directory. Fails with error when the file cannot be written, for example if it is write-protected or locked. Also fails if the output directory does not exist.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file
        the - text to be written
